channel.title: hax on Cryspen
channel.description: Recent content in hax on Cryspen

item.title: Announcing Campus Cyber Circus Project
item.description: ðŸŽ‰ We’re excited to announce that Cryspen partnered with Inria on a transfer project to build a new integrated development and verification environment (IDVE).

item.title: Specifying Oblivious Pseudonymization
item.description: In this blog post we announce an executable specification in the hacspec specification language for the ScrambleDB pseudonymization system, developed by Cryspen as part of the BMBF ATLAS project.

item.title: Prairie and Atlas
item.description: With the widespread adoption and deployment of machine learning across enterprises, ever-increasing amounts of data are being collected, stored, communicated, combined, and computed over by sophisticated algorithms.

item.title: Cryspen @ RWC 2023
item.description: At Real World Crypto 2023 in Tokyo, we gave a talk on the hacspec language, the hax tool, and the libcrux crypto library.

item.title: High Assurance Software Toolchain
item.description: Cryspen collaborates with the Prosecco team at Inria to develop a usable, robust, development environment and verification toolchain for security critical software.
